posts.name: Brook's Sandwich House
posts.note: Brook's Sandwich House is a tiny roadside stop with a walk-up window serving burgers, chili, and simple sandwiches for 40+ years. You need to order the cheese burger all the way with chili.

posts.name: Diamond Restaurant
posts.note: Diamond Restaurant is a hipster-friendly Greek diner serves a vast comfort-food menu with Greek, Italian and Southern accents. You need to order the big block burger with pimento cheese.

posts.name: Duke's Grill
posts.note: Duke's Grill has been around since 1951 in the Five Points area of Monroe before moving to its current location. From what I have heard you need to get chili, slaw, and onions.

posts.name: South 21 Drive In
posts.note: South 21 Drive In is an old, drive-in stop for classic American comfort food with curb service since 1955. You need to order yourself a Super Boy.
